function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid growth of technology industry leading to increased data mining and analytics","Impact":"Potential for unmitigated contagious diseases transmission due to lack of emphasis on public health","Mitigation":"Implement public health data analysis and intervention strategies alongside data mining","Technologies":"Public health data analytics platforms, GIS mapping for disease tracking","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"Public health organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Democratization of analytics for non-experts through easy-to-use web tools and dashboards","Impact":"Risk of misinterpretation and misapplication of data, leading to ineffective disease control measures","Mitigation":"Provide education and training on data interpretation and promote collaboration between data experts and public health professionals","Technologies":"Data literacy training platforms, collaboration tools for interdisciplinary teams","People":"Non-expert users, public health professionals, data scientists","Owner":"Educational institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Emphasis on big data leading to prioritization of data-driven research over traditional scientific method","Impact":"Risk of overlooking important public health hypotheses and interventions in favor of data-driven correlations","Mitigation":"Promote the integration of data-driven research with hypothesis testing and evidence-based public health strategies","Technologies":"Integrated data analysis platforms, decision support systems for evidence-based interventions","People":"Public health researchers, data scientists, policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
